catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 61
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: book with brightly colored images interspersed with may pages of text; images of men and women indoors; image with man and woman inside a temple with monk; woman lying on a mat with mourners; man and woman crying; navy blue cover with title on decorated paper; silver lining inside cover
medium: Ink, color, gold, and gold leaf on paper
title: The Tale of Hachikazuki, vol. 2
